input.label: Category (Any Label to Identify these Users)

html.p: The tagged users list is owned by a lookup table called TaggedUsers. You are welcome to manually edit that file by finding it at $SPLUNK_HOME/etc/apps/search_activity/lookups/TaggedUsers.csv. You may also wish to manipulate it through the UI by leveraging Luke Murphy's fantastic Lookup Editor App from apps.splunk.com. You can also add this functionality into whatever workflow you would like by referencing the SA_Add_Tagged_Users("comma,separated,user,list","category") macro. You can even add users by using the workflow action found when looking through audit logs manually from this app. However, you can also put a username (or a comma-separated list of usernames - no spaces) into the below, and this dashboard will add it for you.
